ai_explanation.introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is "にあう," which you will often hear in contexts involving fashion and style. For example, when someone compliments an outfit, they might say "それはとてもにあう！" meaning "It suits you very well!"
ai_explanation.meaning_explanation_english: The word "にあう" means something suits you or looks good on you. It's often used when talking about clothes or styles that match someone well. When a particular piece of clothing, accessory, or hairstyle complements someone's appearance, you'd say it "にあっている" (looks good on them).
ai_explanation.kanji_explanation_english: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.

examples.kanji: あのくつは彼女に似合います。
examples.furigana: あのくつは彼女(かのじょ)に似合(にあ)います。

translations.ES: Esos zapatos le quedan bien a ella.
translations.VI: Đôi giày đó hợp với cô ấy.
translations.TL: Ang sapatos na iyon ay bagay sa kanya.
translations.MY: အဲဒီဖိနပ်ကသူမနဲ့လိုက်ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह जूते उस पर जंचते हैं।

examples.kanji: 彼女はワンピースが似合う。
examples.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)はワンピースが似合(にあ)う。

translations.EN: She looks good in a dress.
translations.ID: Dia terlihat bagus dengan baju terusan.
translations.ES: Le queda bien el vestido a ella.
translations.VI: Cô ấy trông hợp với chiếc váy.
translations.FR: Elle est belle dans une robe.
translations.TL: Maganda siya tingnan sa damit na isang piraso.
translations.MY: သူမသည်ဝမ်းပိုင်းဖက်ရှင်နှင့်မွှမ်းလျော့နေလခြင်းပင်၌အတော်အသင့်လှပြီလက္ခဏာတူ၏။
translations.HI: वह एक पीस ड्रेस में अच्छी लगती है।
translations.FA: او با لباس یکسره زیبا به نظر می‌رسد.

examples.kanji: あなたはめがねが似合う。
examples.furigana: あなたはめがねが似合(にあ)う。

translations.VI: Bạn trông đẹp khi đeo kính.
translations.MY: မင်းကမ်းတီမှီပတ်ပါဘဲ။
translations.HI: तुम पर चश्मा अच्छा लगता है।

examples.furigana: このぼうしが似合(にあ)う。

translations.VI: Chiếc mũ này hợp với bạn.
translations.TL: Bagay sa'yo ang sombrero na ito.
translations.MY: ဤဉီးထုပ်သည် သင်နှင့် လိုက်ဖက်သည်။
translations.HI: यह टोपी आप पर जँच रही है।

examples.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は私服(しふく)が似合(にあ)う。

translations.EN: She looks good in casual clothes.
translations.ID: Dia terlihat bagus dengan pakaian santai.
translations.ES: Ella se ve bien con ropa casual.
translations.VI: Cô ấy mặc đẹp trong trang phục thường.
translations.FR: Elle a l'air bien en tenue décontractée.
translations.TL: Maganda siya sa kaswal na damit.
translations.MY: သူမသည် အဝတ်အစားဝတ်ရုံဖြင့် သဘာဝကျပြီး ချစ်စရာကောင်းသည်။
translations.HI: वह सादे कपड़ों में अच्छी लगती है।
translations.AR: هي تبدو جيدة في الملابس العادية.
translations.FA: او در لباس‌های غیررسمی خوب به نظر می‌رسد.

ai_explanation.synonyms_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word are "まっちする." This term is often used when something fits or matches appropriately. While "にあう" typically refers to style or clothing, "まっちする" can apply to various things like colors matching well.

parts_of_speech: Godan verb with 'u' ending, Intransitive verb
